channel.title: Jim's Docs
channel.description: Jim's Docs houses various technical documentation related to R meant to be shared.

item.title: Configure GPG and SSH for WSL on Windows
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: Learn how to properly manage and conigure your precious SSH and GPG keys with Windows Subsystem for Linux.

item.title: Building the Foundation of a Comprehensive Actuarial Analysis
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: In Part I of the multi-post series I introduce how to build the foundation of a Comprehensive Actuarial Analysis.

item.title: Create a Custom R Project Launcher
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: Introducing a simple, yet powerful tool I created to quickly launch any R project.

item.title: Dealing with Images in R
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: A walkthrough of dealing with images in R and creating a custom image gallery.

item.title: R Package Developer Essentials
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: A walkthrough of the various packages, tools, resources, and axioms I have encountered over my years as an R package sofware engineer.

item.title: Experimenting with Caching Backends in R
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: Take a look at some of the more advanced, modern ways of utilizing backend caching with hosted applications or workflows.

item.title: Searching from R
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: 'Utilize advanced searching techniques to quickly launch a search from R'

item.title: Welcome to Jim's Docs
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, Jim's Docs. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!
